channel.title: init on Dheepak's blog
channel.description: Recent content in init on Dheepak's blog

item.title: Welcome to the site!
item.description: This is a new site built on Jekyll, hosted on GitHub. I came across the GitHub Pages. As the flow looks intriguing, I’m trying out this. As a blogger I tried out Wordpress, Blogspot and Medium. The interest to compose a post fizzles out very often. However, I’m trying harder to reverse the trend. Let’s see how it goes.
